summary: Function "target_form" takes action and target as inputs, returns a tuple containing both values. Function "reverse_target" reverses the order of action and target in a tuple before returning it. The code seems to be performing some sort of data manipulation on tuples for an observer.

details.comment: Function "target_form" takes action and target as inputs, returns a tuple containing both values. Function "reverse_target" reverses the order of action and target in a tuple before returning it. The code seems to be performing some sort of data manipulation on tuples for an observer.
